Literature.Title: Efficient in planta production of amidated antimicrobial peptides that are active against drug-resistant ESKAPE pathogens.
Literature.Author: Chaudhary S, Ali Z, Tehseen M, Haney EF, Pantoja-Angles A, Alshehri S, Wang T, Clancy GJ, Ayach M, Hauser CA, Hong PY, Hamdan SM, Hancock REW, Mahfouz M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=147.9 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli PI-7(MIC=>50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter Junii DSMZ 14968(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=50µg/ml)
